text:
These Happy Pictures Of Celebrities Enjoying Diwali With Family & Friends Are Adorable!
These Happy Pictures Of Celebrities Enjoying Diwali With Family & Friends Are Adorable!
No matter how far you wander in life, there is nothing like joining back your family and coming back home.
The best part about Indian festivals is that they bring people closer. Everyone wants to take a break from their work and professional commitments and spend quality time with their loved ones with lots of food and of course, love.
Bollywood celebrities aren't an exception to this rule and they too make sure that they celebrate their festivals and have a great time too.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
From throwing lavish Diwali parties to visiting each other's home, Diwali every year has been about love and togetherness for the film fraternity. In case you are wondering what film peeps have been up to, this Diwali, here are the pictures that will give you a closer look into their personal world.
Viral Bhayani
Viral Bhayani
